text:
Also! I know I’ll have him for a bit after the game (6:00? Drop off) but I never heard back in how I can help. Please don’t be too proud. Let me
shoulder some burden to let you catch your breath!
No harm in that!
Message 1782 of 4024
I agree. We have a very different perspective on how we got here.
I’m doing and have done what I believed to be in best interest of boys and will continue to do so.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 08:12 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 08:22 PM)
Subject:Re: Drop Off
Message 1783 of 4024
Not to argue but perhaps we do as Dr Brown said, “disagree on the past, focus on the future”
Agree, this has all been your plan. I have no influence at all. Do you think it’s going pretty well so far?
Not fighting, just suggesting some reflection. I think both things could be thoughtfully considered.
Hope this lands in the spirit it is intended which is child focused solutions for their mental health.
I’m not expecting a debate. I was not even expecting a response. I said “we are both on board together”.
Thanks!
Sent:03/01/2024 at 08:30 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/02/2024 at 08:08 AM)
Subject:Re: Drop Off
Message 1784 of 4024
Hey- If you could let me know the answer to at least the Sonos questions tomorrow it would be great. Ideally I could get the sub from the computer
closet after or at the game. It’s still in its box I think. It’s heavy though, so I do not mind grabbing it myself under your close supervision. I’m just
blocked again trying to rebuild stuff. I really appreciate it. Thanks!
And my offer to help still stands!!
